```{r}
library("opensignauxfaibles")
```

```{r}
dplyr::tbl(database_signauxfaibles, "output_2017_07_05") %>% 
  dplyr::anti_join(
    y = compute_filter_proccollectives(db = database_signauxfaibles, .date = "2017-01-01"), 
    by = "numero_compte"
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::anti_join(
    y = compute_filter_ccsv(db = database_signauxfaibles, .date = "2017-03-01"), 
    by = c("numero_compte") 
  ) %>% 
  arrange(
    desc(
      prediction_0_12
      )
    ) %>% 
  filter(is.na(prediction_0_12) == FALSE) %>% 
  select(raison_sociale, siren, siret, 
         libelle_naf_niveau1, code_departement, siege, 
         prediction_0_12, 
         effectif, 
         apart_last12_months, apart_consommee, apart_share_heuresconsommees, 
         nb_debits, delai, delai_sup_6mois
  ) %>%
  collect() %>%
  slice(1:100) 
```
